name: Sour Joker
description: Sour Joker is the stimulating sativa blend of Amnesia Haze and East Coast Sour Diesel (ECSD). This amped combination offers consumers a vigorous body buzz that is clear-headed and motivating, encouraging physical activity in or outside. Harness the mental clarity of this strain at lower doses and the fueled-up stimulation with continued use.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Energetic, Focused, Fatigue, Nausea, Depression, Stress, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid, Dizzy
